Card.Name: Vine Trellis
Card.RulesText: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {T}: Add {G}.

Card.Name: Wall of Roots
Card.RulesText: Defender Put a -0/-1 counter on Wall of Roots: Add {G}. Activate only once each turn.

Card.Name: Elvish Archers
Card.RulesText: First strike

Card.Name: Rofellos, Llanowar Emissary
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {G} for each Forest you control.

Card.Name: Albino Troll
Card.RulesText: Echo {1}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) {1}{G}: Regenerate Albino Troll.

Card.Name: Mirri, Cat Warrior
Card.RulesText: First strike, forestwalk, vigilance (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike, it can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest, and attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

Card.Name: Argothian Wurm
Card.RulesText: Trample When Argothian Wurm enters the battlefield, any player may sacrifice a land. If a player does, put Argothian Wurm on top of its owner's library.

Card.Name: Citanul Centaurs
Card.RulesText: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Echo {3}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

Card.Name: Blastoderm
Card.RulesText: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Fading 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

Card.Name: Crumble
Card.RulesText: Destroy target artifact. It can't be regenerated. That artifact's controller gains life equal to its mana value.

Card.Name: Wild Growth
Card.RulesText: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}.

Card.Name: Thermokarst
Card.RulesText: Destroy target land. If that land was a snow land, you gain 1 life.

Card.Name: Winter's Grasp
Card.RulesText: Destroy target land.

Card.Name: Fallow Earth
Card.RulesText: Put target land on top of its owner's library.

Card.Name: Phyrexian Processor
Card.RulesText: As Phyrexian Processor enters the battlefield, pay any amount of life. {4}, {T}: Create an X/X black Phyrexian Minion creature token, where X is the life paid as Phyrexian Processor entered the battlefield.

Card.Name: Creeping Mold
Card.RulesText: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

Card.Name: Nevinyrral's Disk
Card.RulesText: Nevinyrral's Disk enters the battlefield tapped. {1}, {T}: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.

Card.Name: Predator, Flagship
Card.RulesText: {2}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. {5}, {T}: Destroy target creature with flying.

Card.Name: Plow Under
Card.RulesText: Put two target lands on top of their owners' libraries.

Card.Name: Wasteland
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice Wasteland: Destroy target nonbasic land.

Card.Name: Treetop Village
Card.RulesText: Treetop Village enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}. {1}{G}: Treetop Village becomes a 3/3 green Ape creature with trample until end of turn. It's still a land. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
